name: Christmas Snow: Snowman Rescue
description:
Chocolate the Snowman is stuck in a blizzard!
Keep popping snowflakes to keep him from getting buried.
* Beat Easy mode to unlock Advanced
* Beat Advanced as well to unlock Expert mode (a difficulty level not for the faint of finger!)

Pop snowflakes and set high-scores!

A fun game for all the family, kids & adults.

Enjoy,
Your AppChocolate Team

Got some feedback about our apps? Then send us a snowflake (or an email) to info@appchocolate.com!
* * * * *
Follow us on Twitter: @AppChocolate
